summary:
Ancient Nord Armor is supposed to be armor for great warriors! But for the women it´s more of a stripper outfit. This mod changes that.

Cuirass mesh used in this mod, originally made by Gulchanar
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2636355
descriptionHtml:
Ancient Nord Armor is supposed to be armor for great warriors! But for the women it´s more of a stripper outfit. This mod changes that.

The gloves are cleaner and slightly more colorful and the boots have been changed to the male version as well.

Cuirass mesh used in this mod, originally made by Gulchanar
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2636355

To install, simply extract the .rar into your skyrim folder.

To uninstall, simply remove these files:
DatameshesarmordraugrDraugrArmorFemale_0.nif
DatameshesarmordraugrDraugrArmorFemale_1.nif
Datameshesarmordraugrdraugrbootsfemale_0.nif
Datameshesarmordraugrdraugrbootsfemale_1.nif
Datameshesarmordraugrdraugrbootsfemale_go.nif
Datatexturesarmordraugrfemaledraugrarmor.dds
Datatexturesarmordraugrfemaledraugrarmor_n.dds
Datatexturesarmordraugrfemaledraugrgauntlets.dds
Datatexturesarmorstormcloaksfemalepauldron.dds
Datatexturesarmorstormcloaksfemalepauldron_n.dds
author: Akratus
